Message.Title: Holding on to T! Gonna Rise like Bread...
Message.Msg: Extremely happy I got in T a week ago at a lower point. Its amazing how a little bit of good news can make a stock like T rise this much. I cant say that these numbers will last, and i know the activity so far might be short-winded so its better to get out while you can. Im probably gonna buy back in a later time and play the margins day to day. Detailed daily trends for T can be seen hear, with active reports before the news hits the floor: website BigTeasuryStock

Message.Title: Secession?...
Message.Msg: ... Ironically, I see this morning that some of those folks who are not at all pleased with the outcome of the election have decided to sign symbolic petitions to secede from the United States. I say “ironically” because I just got this from a friend (origination unknown). I don’t know if this was in response to the petitions or not, but, regardless, it suggests that their secession might not be such a bad idea. This is obviously written tongue in cheek, as I can’t recall previous times when losing the election caused sore losers to whine about starting their own country. I thought democracy meant standing united behind the will of the majority, not “if I don’t get my own way I’m gonna’ take my ball and go home. Boo-Hoo.” A Message to the Red States We're tired of your Neanderthal attitudes and politics and we've decided we're leaving. We in the Blue States intend to form our own country. In case you aren't aware, this will include California, Hawaii, Oregon, Washington, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Michigan, Illinois and the rest of the Northeast. We believe this split will be beneficial to the nation and especially to the people of the new country of The Enlightened States of America (E.S.A). To sum up briefly: You get Texas, Oklahoma and all the slave states. We get stem cell research and the Rocky Mountains. We get Andrew Cuomo and Elizabeth Warren. You get Bobby Jindal and Todd Akin. We get the Statue of Liberty. You get OpryLand. We get Google, Apple, Yahoo and Tesla. You get Colonel Sanders. We get Stanford. You get Ole' Miss. We get 85 percent of America’s venture capital and entrepreneurs. You get Alabama. We get two-thirds of the tax revenue. You get to make the red states pay their fair share. Since our aggregate divorce rate is 22 percent lower than the Christian Coalition's, we get a bunch of happy families. You get a bunch of single moms. With the Blue States in hand we will have firm control of 80% of the country's fresh water, more than 90% of the pineapple and lettuce, 92% of the nation's fresh fruit, 95% of America's quality wines (you can serve French wines at state dinners), 90% of all cheese, 90 percent of the high tech industry, most of the US low sulphur coal, all living redwoods, sequoias and condors, all the Ivy and Seven Sister schools plus Harvard, Yale, Stanford, Princeton, Cal Tech and MIT. With the Red States you will have to cope with 88% of all obese Americans and their projected health care costs, 92% of all US mosquitoes, nearly 100% of the tornadoes, 90% of the hurricanes, 99% of all Southern Baptists, virtually 100% of all televangelists, Rush Limbaugh, Bob Jones University, Clemson and the University of Georgia. We get Olympic National Park and Yosemite, thank you. 38% of those in the Red states believe Jonah was actually swallowed by a whale, 62% believe life is sacred unless we're discussing the death penalty or gun laws, 44% say that evolution is only a theory, 53% that Saddam was involved in 9/11, and 61% of you crazy bas#ards believe you are people with higher morals then we lefties. We're taking the good weed too. You can have that crap they grow in Mexico. Sincerely, Citizen of the Enlightened States of America

"Republicans lost the election because they have one constituency: old people, particularly old white people. " Who worked their entire life and want to keep what's theirs. The democrats have young people and 5th generation minorities who think they are entitled to the old white people's money.
That's right, tax taker. Here's another fact for you. Mitt Romney's plan to cut the tax rate to 0% for up $200,000 in investment income would have added a whole slew of people to the tax taker group.

Makes sense to me. You have to have that 'flexibility' in order to bow. What makes you think it is random? There are a lot of true statements in that list and if and when any of those things happen, we can lay them at the feet of the fools like you that voted for Obama. What is surprising about all the 'scandals' going on around his administration is not that they happened but that the MSM are reporting anything about them and that even some Democrats (surely looking forward already to the mid-terms) are questioning this administration’s actions. I suspect soon that the President will begin claiming 'executive privilege' soon to stop all the speculation and investigations. That will not sit will this time around. After all as you’re so fond of saying, you won. Things should be easier. Does anyone else question why when Obama starts his private (more of that transparency) meetings regarding the looming fiscal cliff that he has the first one with the unions, not the business people? You wanna explain that Mr. Talking Points?
Yeah, but your no racists are you! Or biased in any way are you! You're a phony.
Fools that voted for Grover Norquist, I mean Romney, lost. Thank God we have Obama in there on our side.

What's wrong with being anti abortion? You like allowing women to just kill kids they don't want? Few conservatives are against ANY abortion, only abortion on demand or as a birth control system. Liberals oppose the death penalty but support abortion and you called Romney a two face. Most are not anti-birth control, just anti-taxpayer paid birth control. We are not anti-Muslim, just anti-radical Muslim. You need to spend more time learning more about your ‘enemies’ instead of listing to MSM sound bites.
minni is turning into Ricky’s nasty name calling alter ego. No wait, Ricky is still doing that as well, so perhaps they are different bigots.

"Who worked their entire life and want to keep what's theirs. " Can you name one name of one of them, who makes over 250k adjusted gross income, which is what it is on, not gross income? I am one of those people above in your quote, and I voted for Obama, because he is on our side. Name one. You have been brain washed. Do you know about Grover Norquist?

Bull hockey, this administration does nothing that is non-partisan. If a thorough investigation is allowed you will find that the investigation into the fine general (and I truly mean that) and Libya are connected. Perhaps not in the general’s actions, but in the political protection schemes that are being invented by this administration. They are not to be trusted.
Is this constant one line confusion the best you have to offer?

Who were privileged their entire lives and have become a bunch of blinder-wearing narcisissists. 30 years of debt, unsustainable old age entitlements, unfunded pension funds-- you built that. Not your kids. But you expect your kids to pay for them, don't you? You are right though. Democrats have people with a future, not a past.
Then do it. I'm getting really tired of you Ayn Rand, Rick Perry types with your idle threats. Get out. Leave. Secede. Go. Be gone. America. Love it or leave it.

But that would only be labeled partisan politics. You cannot question this administration’s actions without be called a partisan and a blocker. You cannot criticize this President without being called a racist. It makes little difference if there are valid reasons for the criticism or concern; the racist claim is part of this administrations claim to fame and protection. They can call others felons, say they're responsible for cancer deaths, etc. but don’t you dare call this man into question; that automatically makes you a member of the KKK.

Example, if you make, after all deductions, expenses, payroll, etc, $300,000 net income, you would pay an extra 2,000-2,500 in tax. Is that so much for someone making that kind of income, after deductions, to pay out of the 300,000? They still get the 250k lower tax rate. Don't be fooled by Grover, we have the right man in there for us middle class people, and he is elected, THANK GOD. Romney was nothing more than a Grover puppet to be. READ about Grover and what he is up to with his pledges. It is subverting democracy to intimidate and threaten our elected representatives, but that is exactly what Grover has done.

And many of them were belittled for their poor choices. Do you recall the things said about Bush? The false stories that cost some MSM member their careers; do any of these things ring a bell? Why is it against the rules to do so with this President?

"I see no problem with socialism if done correctly." Please cite an example where it has successfully worked, at least in the opinion of those having to live under socials rule? Please explain, 'done correctly' and how that would allow people the freedoms of choice and liberty that a non-socialist government provides. Sorry about you health concerns but please don't wish this damnation on your children or ours. History and common sense are not on your side.
Thanks to both gopher_chaser and t.bfine.
Thanks to both gopher_chaser and t.bfine.

The point is that the economy is NOT recovering. Jobs are NOT being created only dreamed up by statisticians and politicians. The point is that the new health care law will, according the nations business leaders cost more than they want to pay or can afford in the case of many small businesses. This will help keep the economy stalled. This will help this administration because it will keep people poor and dependant on the government more each day. That is the point...the point of this administration, the Democratic Party and this President in particular. If you’re missing the points, it has to be because you simply are looking or listening to the world around you. Wake up before it is too late, and it may already be too late. Now we all just need to sit back and patiently wait for Ricky to post some more meaningless government created statistics. Just wait, it will come.

"We are not anti-Muslim" The election issue was abortion in rape or incest. yes many of "you" are anti muslim, enough to call our Christian President a muslim for no reason, as if that is bad. Totally anti-muslim, not minding your own business, imposing your views on others. California voted for the death penalty to stay. Thanks be to God Obama is our President.

Message.Msg: ... “…thats because over 25% of young black women carry some form of STD. fact. and mostly given to them from previous black boyfriends…” Two questions. First: While we know that you folks aren’t real big on facts, per se, would you be so kind as to provide your source for that intriguing, yet intellectually suspect, parcel of information.? (“lavender told me” will not suffice, incidentally.) And two: One in four black women, you say? So, of Condoleezza Rice, Angela McGlowan, Star Parker and Herman Cain’s wife, which one is the Typhoid Mary of your Tea Party inspired sexist, racism?
"What makes you think it is random?" Really? The Soviet Union? I have to explain why this is nonsense? Seniles!

Arizona is gearing up for more and more businesses moving here from California. The policies of "Moonbeam" Brown and the freaks in Sacramento are driving businesses out of the state. I owned shares in a very well known sporting goods company that moved from California to Idaho some years back. They couldn't afford the taxes and needless regulations. They are now doing very well. Even shipping goods to both Russia and China instead of the other way around. "Liberals" are a plague that destroys all they touch.

..........."You get Texas, Oklahoma and all the slave states"........ Don't look now but we are ALL enslaved thanks to you libs. In any event your scenario would not work. Libs don't like to work and produce and prosper, so when life's necessities run out, you all will just wind up eating each other and that will be that.

This government has been corrupt for a long time. The problem is that the citizenry is corrupt too. They all want "something for nothing". The acronym "TANSTAFL" should be memorized by all. "There ain't no such thing as a free lunch".
And you haven't been genocided yet either. . .
Google "George Washington's Vision". I believe it to be valid. The true God will have his say and I believe very shortly. "Satan knows his time to be short and goes forth seeking who He may destroy."

... “Libs don't like to work and produce and prosper…” Is being totally ignorant now a requirement for you folks? Forbes magazine tells us that of the top 20 richest people in America, 60% are Democrats (if you eliminate duplicates from the same family in that group, it’s actually 75%.) And of course, the top three on the list – Gates, Buffet and Ellison, worth a combined total of 126 billion dollars – are all Democrats. While they’re working and prospering, you’re making stuff up and spreading lies on a message board for minimum wage, while lecturing on who’s more motivated. Strange values!

... “The true God will have his say and I believe very shortly.” Well have somebody notify us when She smites you with a bolt of lightning this afternoon for being a racist…if you wife doesn’t first smack you upside the head with a frying pan for being a lazy, ignorant chauvinistic, bigot – now go take out the garbage. Hey, btw, while YOUR true god is having his say, what are everyone else’s true gods going to be doing…joining a mime troupe until he’s finished?

Message.Title: Conflicting market data
Message.Msg: For whatever it is worth, institutional ownership of a stock is thought out to be a valuable parameter since the institutions are thought out to be "long-term" investors which is predicated on a massive internal research they constantly do. More to the point. S&P cites the institutional ownership of T at 51.0% while Mr and Mrs Yahoo shows this number to be 75.3. I tend to believe the later.
